    corrected_bits = ''.join(str(data[i][j]) for i in range(m) for j in range(n))
    
    # Append the row and column parities
    corrected_bits += ''.join(str((sum(data[i]) % 2)) for i in range(m))
    corrected_bits += ''.join(str((sum(data[i][j] for i in range(m)) % 2)) for j in range(n))
    
    return corrected_bits

    for j in range(n):
        if current_col_parities[j] != col_parities[j]:
            col_error = j

    # If both row and column are found, there's an error
    if row_error != -1 and col_error != -1:

    corrected_bits = ''.join(''.join(map(str, row)) for row in grid)

    for j in range(n):

            if error_col != -1:  # more than one column has an error
                return bits  # can't fix
            error_col = j

    if error_row != -1 and error_col != -1:
        # Flip the bit at the intersection
        grid[error_row][error_col] ^= 1

    new_row_parity = ''.join(str(sum(grid[i]) % 2) for i in range(m))
    new_col_parity = ''.join(str(sum(grid[i][j] for i in range(m)) % 2) for j in range(n))
    
    return corrected_bits + new_row_parity + new_col_parity
